text: Former Vice President Al Gore says President Trump and his administration have failed to properly handle the Covid-19 pandemic. "He has failed as President, particularly on this challenge. The warnings were ignored." #CNNTownHall https://t.co/HdESHLHAvi https://t.co/VlctQCEnhs
